nodes.excerpt: The all-new MacKeeper 5 includes cleaning, performance, protection, and privacy tools. Organize your Mac by freeing up gigabytes of space on your hard drive while protecting you from viruses, malware, and identity theft. The best part - the app is super easy to use.
nodes.title: Mackeeper -  Organize your Mac by freeing up space on your hard drive
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 全新的 MacKeeper 5 包括清洁、性能、保护和隐私工具。通过释放硬盘上的数GB空间来整理你的Mac，同时保护你免受病毒、恶意软件和身份盗窃的侵害。最棒的是，这款应用超级容易使用。
localize.tagline: 通过释放硬盘上的空间来整理你的 Mac。

localize.description: 全新的 MacKeeper 5 包括清潔、性能、保護和隱私工具。通過釋放硬盤上的數GB空間來整理你的Mac，同時保護你免受病毒、惡意軟件和身份盜竊的侵害。最棒的是，這款應用超級容易使用。
localize.tagline: 通過釋放硬盤上的空間來整理你的 Mac。

nodes.excerpt: Superpowered is a calendar app in your menu bar. See your daily schedule and join meetings without having to go to your calendar. Download and get started in less than 1 minute!

localize.description: Superpowered是你菜单栏中的一个日历应用。查看您的每日日程安排和加入会议，而无需进入您的日历。下载并在不到1分钟的时间内开始使用!

nodes.excerpt: Our 1-click video call platform enables the end customer to call the business with zero friction. Visual engagement creates trust, facilitates the transaction, accelerates sales, improves satisfaction. Make real-time video an integral part of your solutions.

localize.description: 我们的一键视频通话平台可以让终端客户零摩擦地给企业打电话。视觉参与创造信任，促进交易，加速销售，提高满意度。让实时视频成为您的解决方案中不可或缺的一部分。

nodes.excerpt: With Batch Styler editing multiple styles in Figma becomes way easier: Change all your color & typography styles at once, changing details like hue or font family within seconds.

nodes.excerpt: Squat is also called full squat. It is one of the most complex and practiced movements in bodybuilding. It is also a movement in powerlifting competitions. This is an app that automatically records the number of squats through sensors.
nodes.title: Daily Squat Workout App - Fitness app to track your squat workout
nodes.author: Nine

localize.description: 蹲式也叫全蹲。它是健美比赛中最复杂、练习量最大的动作之一。它也是力量举比赛中的一个动作。这是一款通过传感器自动记录下蹲次数的应用。
localize.tagline: 追踪你的下蹲训练的健身应用

localize.description: 蹲式也叫全蹲。它是健美比賽中最複雜、練習量最大的動作之一。它也是力量舉比賽中的一個動作。這是一款通過傳感器自動記錄下蹲次數的應用。
localize.tagline: 追蹤你的下蹲訓練的健身應用

nodes.excerpt: ⚡ The Hashnode Blog Cards is a set of GET requests which will fetch the Blogs from your Hashnode ids with few parameters and will create SVG cards to bring 😎 awesomeness to your blog links. 🎉 Github link https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
nodes.title: Hashnode Blog Cards - Replace your Hashnode Blog links with Blogs Cards.
nodes.author: Sourav Dey

localize.description: ⚡ Hashnode博客卡是一组GET请求，它将通过少量参数从你的Hashnode ids中获取博客，并将创建SVG卡，为你的博客链接带来😎惊艳。🎉 Github 链接 https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
localize.tagline: 将您的Hashnode博客链接替换为博客卡。

localize.description: ⚡ Hashnode博客卡是一組GET請求，它將通過少量參數從你的Hashnode ids中獲取博客，並將創建SVG卡，爲你的博客鏈接帶來😎驚豔。🎉 Github 鏈接 https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
localize.tagline: 將您的Hashnode博客鏈接替換爲博客卡。

nodes.excerpt: A Powerful Mac* App to... • zoom into pixels • measure angles & distances • sample colors and maintain palettes • check alignments • real-time color-blindness and color-contrast • take snapshots • real-time distances and bounding boxes..and much, much more.
nodes.title: QuickLens - Inspect the UI of apps, illustrations & websites like a PRO!
nodes.author: Pavan Podila

localize.description: 一款功能强大的Mac*应用程序，用于... - 缩放像素 - 测量角度和距离 - 采样颜色和维护调色板 - 检查对齐 - 实时色盲和色彩对比 - 拍摄快照 - 实时距离和边界框......以及更多。
localize.tagline: 像专业人员一样检查应用程序、插图和网站的用户界面!

localize.description: 一款功能強大的Mac*應用程序，用於... - 縮放像素 - 測量角度和距離 - 採樣顏色和維護調色板 - 檢查對齊 - 實時色盲和色彩對比 - 拍攝快照 - 實時距離和邊界框......以及更多。
localize.tagline: 像專業人員一樣檢查應用程序、插圖和網站的用戶界面!

nodes.excerpt: Translate words straight from your Alfred launcher: - Open Alfred - Type a language combination and a word: `fren fromage` - Press enter to open the results page on WordReference! Get access to 48 dictionaries across 18 different languages!
nodes.title: WordReference for Alfred - Multilingual translations at your fingertips!
nodes.author: Alex Martin

localize.description: 直接从您的Alfred启动器翻译单词： - 打开Alfred - 输入语言组合和单词：`fren fromage` - 按回车键打开WordReference上的结果页面! 获得跨越18种不同语言的48种词典的访问权限!
localize.tagline: 多语种翻译触手可及!

localize.description: 直接從您的Alfred啓動器翻譯單詞： - 打開Alfred - 輸入語言組合和單詞：`fren fromage` - 按回車鍵打開WordReference上的結果頁面! 獲得跨越18種不同語言的48種詞典的訪問權限!
localize.tagline: 多語種翻譯觸手可及!

nodes.excerpt: Meetings won't feel like they go on forever anymore. Zoom Agenda lets you create an agenda and add a timer to every agenda item so you know how long to spend discussing about each item.
nodes.title: Zoom Agenda Timer - Create a timer for your agenda items on Zoom.
nodes.author: Danielle Song

localize.description: 会议不会再有永远进行下去的感觉。Zoom Agenda可以让您创建一个议程，并为每个议程项目添加一个计时器，这样您就可以知道每个项目的讨论时间。
localize.tagline: 在Zoom上为您的议程项目创建一个定时器。

localize.description: 會議不會再有永遠進行下去的感覺。Zoom Agenda可以讓您創建一個議程，併爲每個議程項目添加一個計時器，這樣您就可以知道每個項目的討論時間。
localize.tagline: 在Zoom上爲您的議程項目創建一個定時器。

nodes.excerpt: CyberCat VPN is Your Unlimited, Encrypted, Fast & Ad Free VPN for iPhone & iPad. Welcome to a new world of internets with a super fast and secure no log VPN. Bring down the virtual walls and pounce on all the content you can handle.
nodes.title: CyberCat VPN - A privacy focused, Ad blocking, Unlimited VPN for iOS. Meow
nodes.author: James Stanley

localize.description: CyberCat VPN是您的iPhone和iPad的无限制，加密，快速和无广告的VPN。欢迎来到一个全新的网络世界，拥有一个超级快速和安全的无日志VPN。拆除虚拟墙，扑向所有你能处理的内容。
localize.tagline: 一款专注于隐私、广告屏蔽、无限VPN的iOS版。喵

localize.description: CyberCat VPN是您的iPhone和iPad的無限制，加密，快速和無廣告的VPN。歡迎來到一個全新的網絡世界，擁有一個超級快速和安全的無日誌VPN。拆除虛擬牆，撲向所有你能處理的內容。

nodes.excerpt: Planetary is a social media app built upon the idea of protocols not platforms. Users and creators own their identities and social relationships. Privacy is respected and creators supported. Abuse and harassment is handled through community governance.
nodes.title: Planetary - Decentralized social media by and for the people.
nodes.author: rabble

localize.description: Planetary是一个建立在协议而非平台理念上的社交媒体应用。用户和创作者拥有自己的身份和社交关系。隐私得到尊重，创作者得到支持。滥用和骚扰通过社区治理来处理。
localize.tagline: 分散化的社交媒体由人民主导并为人民服务。

localize.description: Planetary是一個建立在協議而非平臺理念上的社交媒體應用。用戶和創作者擁有自己的身份和社交關係。隱私得到尊重，創作者得到支持。濫用和騷擾通過社區治理來處理。
localize.tagline: 分散化的社交媒體由人民主導併爲人民服務。

nodes.excerpt: Well-ordered, extremely user friendly app that will make your invoicing a child's play. Generate professional PDF invoices in a glance. Change your logo, labels and more to make your invoice fit your business requirements.
nodes.title: Dippper - The simplest online tool for creating high-quality invoices.
nodes.author: oussama hamdaoui

localize.description: 秩序井然，极其人性化的应用，让你的发票开具变得像个孩子一样。生成专业的PDF发票，一目了然。更改你的商标、标签等，让你的发票符合你的业务要求。
localize.tagline: 创建高质量发票的最简单的在线工具。

localize.tagline: 創建高質量發票的最簡單的在線工具。

nodes.excerpt: Booste APIs boiling all the pains of the production ML stack into a single line of code. We're super excited to launch an API to OpenAI's powerful new no-training-needed image classifier to Python and Node. Give it a spin!
nodes.title: CLIP API by Booste - Use OpenAI's newest image classifier with one line of code.
nodes.author: Erik Dunteman

localize.description: Booste APIs将生产ML堆栈的所有痛苦归结为一行代码。我们非常兴奋地推出了OpenAI强大的新的无需训练的图像分类器的API到Python和Node。快来试试吧
localize.tagline: 使用OpenAI最新的图像分类器，只需一行代码。

localize.description: Booste APIs將生產ML堆棧的所有痛苦歸結爲一行代碼。我們非常興奮地推出了OpenAI強大的新的無需訓練的圖像分類器的API到Python和Node。快來試試吧
localize.tagline: 使用OpenAI最新的圖像分類器，只需一行代碼。

nodes.excerpt: Learn vim without enduring boring text only tutorials. vim.so gets you the muscle repetition needed to master vim quickly using interactive exercises. Vim adds code editing super powers to your editor of choice. Learn vim fast today!
nodes.title: vim.so - Learn vim fast with interactive exercises in the browser
nodes.author: Kenneth Cassel 🐍

localize.description: vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。Vim 为您选择的编辑器增加了代码编辑的超级能力。今天就来快速学习vim吧！Vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。
localize.tagline: 通过浏览器中的互动练习快速学习vim。

localize.tagline: 通過瀏覽器中的互動練習快速學習vim。

nodes.excerpt: Audiblogs lets you listen to any web article in your podcast player in an Audible-like voice. Use it to "read" while you exercise, cook, do house chores, etc.

nodes.excerpt: Say hello to Paperform V3! We’ve just released a bunch of new features that make Paperform easier to use than ever before. Features include **Guided Mode**, Slash Commands, Background videos and more.

nodes.excerpt: 👋 Clubhouse has very unique image shape and we decided to make a tool for creating colorful borders. This is a weekend project which we made together with @muratcorlu 🚀 It is open source don't worry about your privacy!
nodes.title: Chpic - Create a colorful ring for your profile picture on Clubhouse
nodes.author: Farid Movsumov

localize.description: 👋 会所有非常独特的图像形状，我们决定做一个工具来创建多彩的边框。这是我们和 @muratcorlu 🚀一起做的一个周末项目，它是开源的，不用担心你的隐私。
localize.tagline: 在Clubhouse上为你的个人档案图片设计一个彩色的戒指。

localize.description: 👋 會所有非常獨特的圖像形狀，我們決定做一個工具來創建多彩的邊框。這是我們和 @muratcorlu 🚀一起做的一個週末項目，它是開源的，不用擔心你的隱私。
localize.tagline: 在Clubhouse上爲你的個人檔案圖片設計一個彩色的戒指。
